name: Dust Goblin Chieftain
description: A small humanoid covered in dust, proficient with a shortsword and light crossbow, wearing studded leather armor.
memorable: Utilizes combat tactics that include ambushing tactics, poisonous strikes, and the ability to frighten enemies.
goals: To ambush opponents and gain tactical advantages in combat.
relations: Often found working alongside other goblins or creatures in ambush scenarios.
environment: Deserted or dusty environments where stealth is advantageous.
strengths: High dexterity makes it agile and hard to hit; can inflict significant poison damage.
weaknesses: Low strength; less effective in direct confrontation without stealth.
attacks: Attacks with shortsword or light crossbow, dealing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Sneak Attack, which allows for extra damage when conditions are met.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Skilled in stealth, enabling effective ambush tactics.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened due to Alien Mind ability.
Can read surface thoughts of creatures within 30 feet.
Cunning Action allows for quick tactical positioning.
Can frighten enemies with its Twisted ability from hiding.
Parry ability enhances defense against melee attacks.
